select u.u_nick, p.p_title, p.p_content, p.p_file, p.p_date, p.p_view, p.p_idx from bmt_user u, bmt_post p where u.u_email = p.u_email order by p.p_date desc
) A )
WHERE RN BETWEEN (#{page}*3 + 1) AND ((#{page}+1) * 3)
